channel.title: Comments on: I'll be speaking at Lotusphere

item.title: By: Mark
item.dc:creator: Mark
item.description: <p>Amazing (some how i missed this for a few days), well done (its about time), they are going to be the best sessions ever (apart from the next ones)</p>
item.content:encoded: Amazing (some how i missed this for a few days), well done (its about time), they are going to be the best sessions ever (apart from the next ones)

item.title: By: Phil Randolph
item.dc:creator: Phil Randolph
item.description: <p>Big time congrats to you Matt! It'll be great seeing you up in front presenting for the first times! And both sessions are right up my alley - sweet! <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLS/$File/biggrin.gif"</a> /> </p>
item.content:encoded: Big time congrats to you Matt! It’ll be great seeing you up in front presenting for the first times! And both sessions are right up my alley – sweet! http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLS/$File/biggrin.gif“ />

item.title: By: Mum
item.dc:creator: Mum
item.description: <p> <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GKD/$File/rolleyes.gif"</a> /> Well done!! Need any good voice coaching? Seriously -hope it goes really well and that you enjoy it</p>
item.content:encoded: http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GKD/$File/rolleyes.gif“ /> Well done!! Need any good voice coaching? Seriously -hope it goes really well and that you enjoy it

item.title: By: Theo Heselmans
item.dc:creator: Theo Heselmans
item.description: <p>Way to go Matt. <br />Although I'm still curious as to what you're gonna say at the second session. I'm sure gonna be there !</p>
item.content:encoded:
Way to go Matt.
Although I’m still curious as to what you’re gonna say at the second session. I’m sure gonna be there !
